mapper.insert: INSERT INTO answer ( content, create_date, question_id, author modify_date ) VALUES ( #{content}, #{createDate}, #{questionId}, #{author}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT content, create_date, author, modify_date FROM answer WHERE question_id = #{question_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE answer SET content = #{content}, modify_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{answerId}
